show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Broken Promises
content:
An in-depth look into why promises were made by governments in good faith but which can never be met. <!--more--> Demographics are responsible as is overwhelming levels of debt and senseless money-printing that have had no economically beneficial effect.
War is the natural follow-on, as restless, disgruntled males are ‘put to work’ by their governments, fighting other people.
A detailed look at how American health care stacks up against that of other countries.
A number of comparative statistics, the US versus the world.
Looking at how and why the bailouts have in no sense helped the American public.
In 1970 Americans’ debts rarely exceeded their income.
The appalling reality that I-Phones could not be made in the United States today even if labor costs were not an issue.
More on the derivatives issue.
The real purpose behind the issuance of these toxic instruments.
Zero Hedge’s take on the state of Iraq “before-and-after Bush’s Nation Building effort.”
